critique: The document is a formal announcement regarding the suspension of certain provisions of two public laws related to employment in the Canal Zone. The language is legalistic and devoid of emotional expression. There is no indication of joy, sadness, anger, fear, disgust, or surprise. The content focuses on legal and administrative matters, not on evoking any particular emotion in the reader. Therefore, all emotions should be scored as 1 initially. After further consideration, the lack of emotional content remains clear, so the scores will not be revised.
